title: Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (August 19, 2015 – August 26, 2015)
text:
Thursday, August 27, 2015 4:20PM IST (10:50AM GMT) Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (August 19, 2015 – August 26, 2015) New York, United States The following releases focus on Corporate Social Responsibility and moved during the week of August 19, 2015 – August 26, 2015. HERNDON, Va. -- Redefining Success Beyond Wealth, Respect or Fame Source: Strayer University PLEASANTON, Calif. -- Ellie Mae Employees Join Forces with Habitat for Humanity and the Alameda County Food Bank Source: Ellie Mae, Inc. NEW YORK -- Multi Packaging Solutions Expands Commitment to Social Responsibility Source: Multi Packaging Solutions Follow the CSR Circuit newsfeed on www.twitter.com/BWCSRNews ALL TIME-OFFS ARE IN EASTERN TIME View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150827005142/en/ For News Release background on Business Wire click here CONTACTS : Business Wire Matt VanTassel, 212-752-9600 More News from Business Wire 21/08/2015 11:25AM
